parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Our town, Sondorillo is poor and very dry.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: So, there they encouraged us to do that…

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: what's it called?... the sterilisation operation.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: there’s no wage and your husband is inattentive,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: so one has to find a way to work.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and all 7 of them were small and I still had to work.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: When your husband ignores you and you don't have a wage,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: well, you have to think and work hard.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: And up there in the hills it is dry,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: so they told me not to have too many children,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because I worked hard and could fall ill.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: But the thing is that since the operation our health is delicate,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that’s the only thing, nothing more.
